en.av_c1: Now we look at the remove method.
en.av_c2: Here is the linked list before we remove the node with value 8.
en.av_c3: Remember the value of the current node.
en.av_c4: Pull forward the next node's value
en.av_c5: curr's next field is set to point to the node following the one being deleted. This removes the node from the linked list.
en.av_c7: Return the value of the node that was deleted.
